subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk made impressive putts on Nos. 17 and 18 to card a 68 and take a one-stroke lead over Jason Dufner, who settled for a one-over-par 71 at the third round of the P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: Jim Furyk made impressive putts on Nos. 17 and 18 to card a 68 and take a one-stroke lead over Jason Dufner, who settled for a one-over-par 71 at the third round of the P.G.A. Championship.
